document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the Maechidiini Burmeister, 1855 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae) from the Indo-Australian transition zone, and the first record of the tribe west of Wallace’s Line

17 ♂♂, 26 ♀♀ ; “ Collection Naturhistorisches Museum Basel // Papua New Guinea Madang Prov. L. Cizek lgt.// Salemben village 145°24’E 4°42’S
16.XII. 2000
, 750 m”; NHMB
.

Lamellae of female antennal club shorter; apex of female elytron with conspicuous, long and rather acutely protruding in this species; female pygidium with a glossy flat median longitudinal area between two latero-median humps.
